title: Chief Technology Officer
shortDescription:
- Define and lead the company’s technology vision and strategy during scale-up.
- Oversee Engineering, Data Science, Data Management, and Security.
- Drive AI/ML and automation roadmap; align enterprise architecture for scale and security.
- Build and mentor high-performing teams with strong delivery and governance rigor.
fitRationale:
- End-to-end data + AI platform leadership aligns with your enterprise AI governance narrative.
- Energy infrastructure reliability and security map to trust-at-scale positioning.
- Executive role blending strategy and execution matches your CTO/Chief Architect profile.

title: Chief Architect
shortDescription:
- Lead architecture for VA Enrollment System modernization and legacy integration.
- Design secure, interoperable solutions for high-volume eligibility transactions.
- Drive microservices/API integration, data migration, and cloud-native DevSecOps.
- Ensure compliance with FedRAMP, FISMA, HIPAA, IRS 1075 and VA standards.
fitRationale:
- Strong enterprise architecture scope with heavy compliance/governance.
- Mission-critical modernization aligns with your platform transformation work.
- Security and regulatory depth reinforce your trust-at-scale positioning.

title: Director of Platform Engineering
shortDescription:
- Lead SRE, MLOps, and Platform teams; own platform strategy and standards.
- Mature infrastructure from early-stage to reliable, scalable foundations.
- Partner with product, data, and application engineering to enable rapid delivery.
- Build technical leadership across teams and drive reliability best practices.
fitRationale:
- Direct platform leadership with MLOps/SRE scope aligns to AI platform scale.
- Data + infrastructure leverage mirrors your context-graph and governance themes.
- Climate/utility infrastructure domain supports mission-critical, regulated thinking.

title: Director, Engineering Strategy & Operations
shortDescription:
- Lead Engineering Strategy & Operations; drive org-wide execution excellence.
- Serve as Chief of Staff to the CTO; guide priorities across 300+ engineers.
- Run cross-functional initiatives improving developer experience and operating cadence.
- Influence R&D operations across a 400+ builder organization.
fitRationale:
- Executive-level operating model leadership fits your platform org scale expertise.
- AI-powered security platform reinforces governance and trust narrative.
- High leverage role across large engineering org aligns with enterprise transformation work.

title: Director, System Software and Firmware Engineering
shortDescription:
- Lead a global team building core system software and firmware for PlayStation hardware.
- Own roadmap and delivery for system software and partner integrations.
- Coordinate with global engineering teams and external technology partners.
- Drive reliability, quality, and scalable delivery for hardware platforms.
fitRationale:
- Large-scale platform engineering leadership matches your enterprise scope.
- Hardware + software integration strengthens systems-architecture narrative.
- Global delivery model aligns with your cross-org execution leadership.

title: Chief Technology Officer
shortDescription:
- Lead technical vision and architecture as the company scales platform and AI products.
- Own roadmap across data platform and AI portfolio, ensuring cohesion and scalability.
- Player-coach role: stay close to systems, tradeoffs, and delivery while empowering teams.
- Executive leadership partner to the CEO; influence business planning.
fitRationale:
- Strong alignment to data platform + AI governance themes.
- Public-sector/regulated context reinforces compliance and trust positioning.
- Strategic CTO scope fits enterprise architecture leadership background.

title: Chief Architect
shortDescription:
- Set next-gen architecture vision for Deluxe products & platforms with a payments focus.
- Define integrated payments platform blueprint and ecosystem evolution.
- Lead and mentor an enterprise architecture team; partner with product/engineering leadership.
- Champion scalable, resilient, interoperable solutions across partner ecosystems.
fitRationale:
- Payments platform modernization + enterprise architecture leadership aligns with your platform governance DNA.
- Strong cross-functional influence at executive level fits your operating-model experience.
- Regulated payments context supports your trust-at-scale narrative.

title: Senior Vice President of Data & Infrastructure
shortDescription:
- Report to CTO; oversee 80–100 engineers across data infrastructure (ingestion, prediction, measurement, exchanges).
- Own build/buy/partner strategy for data + infra; drive impact across ambiguous problem spaces.
- Lead a US-based remote engineering org with strong cross-functional collaboration.
- Healthcare context implies high governance/privacy requirements.
fitRationale:
- Very aligned to enterprise data platform leadership + AI/analytics enablement at org scale.
- Strong data-as-product leadership role with room to shape governance, standards, and execution rigor.
- Regulated domain (healthcare) matches your governance/compliance focus.

title: Director, Engineering - Databricks Mosaic AI
shortDescription:
- Lead teams building Mosaic AI products at the NYC AI Engineering Hub.
- Partner with product and research to launch and scale ML/GenAI capabilities for enterprise customers.
- Define the future of AI and data applications on the Databricks platform.
fitRationale:
- High-signal AI platform leadership role with enterprise adoption impact.
- Strong fit for your narrative on governed, scalable AI delivery across data platforms.
- Cross-functional product + research alignment mirrors your context-graph and platform strategy work.

title: Sr. Director, Data Platform Engineering & Operations
shortDescription:
- Lead SIE’s data + AI platform ecosystem (streaming/ingestion/warehouse, governance/observability).
- Operate at massive scale (millions of users; billions of data points/day).
- Stack mentions: Kafka, Databricks, Snowflake; governance tools (Alation/Collibra).
- Bay Area role (San Mateo).
fitRationale:
- Enterprise-scale data/platform leadership with explicit governance + observability responsibilities.
- Strong bridge to AI platform strategy (Databricks/Snowflake + AI/ML adoption).
- Big-org cross-functional leadership very close to your current operating environment.
